mapper.select: select pfl.financing_time_year from investment_institutions_project iip left join projects p on iip.project_id = p.ID left join project_financing_log pfl on iip.project_id = pfl.project_id where iip.investment_institutions_id = #{institutionId} and pfl.financing_time_year is not null group by pfl.financing_time_year order by pfl.financing_time_year desc

select count(1) ct , a.segmentation_name,ms.segmentation_logo from ( select p.id,ps.segmentation_name,p.full_name,iip.investment_institutions_id from project_financing_log pfl left join projects p on pfl.project_id = p.id right join project_segmentation ps on ps.project_id = p.id right join investment_institutions_project iip on iip.project_id = pfl.id where iip.investment_institutions_id = #{institutionId} and ps.segmentation_name is not null group by p.full_name,ps.segmentation_name ) a left join meta_segmentation ms on a.segmentation_name = ms.`name` where ms.segmentation_logo is not null group by a.segmentation_name order by ct desc;
